title: Product search and filter returns correct results
description: Verify that the product search and category filters return correct product lists within 1 second for a medium dataset.

steps.description: Navigate to the main catalog page.
Enter a valid search keyword in the search box.
Apply category filters and other available filters on the sidebar.
Verify that filtered products are displayed in a grid with correct pagination.
Verify the filtering and search results are returned within 1 second.
Check that the neon green glow is visible behind the product grid but does not block interaction.

title: Add and remove products in comparison panel
description: Verify products can be added to and removed from the comparison panel without breaking layout and that it works well on mobile.

steps.description: Navigate to the product catalogue page.
Add multiple products to the comparison panel using the provided UI control.
Verify that the products appear in the comparison sidebar without layout issues.
Navigate to the dedicated product comparison page.
Verify detailed product specifications are displayed correctly for all selected products.
Remove some products from the comparison.
Verify the layout adapts without breaking and the removed products no longer appear.
Test the above on a mobile viewport.
Verify that the layout remains usable and content is not cutoff or overlapping.

title: Manage cart modal: add, modify, remove, clear items
description: Verify user can add products to the cart, adjust quantities, add observations, remove single items, and clear the cart without affecting other items.

steps.description: Navigate to product catalog or comparison page.
Add multiple products to the cart.
Open the cart modal.
Adjust quantity of one product.
Verify quantity is updated correctly and total price adjusts accordingly.
Add an observation note for a product.
Verify the note is saved and visible in the cart modal.
Remove a single item from the cart.
Verify other items remain unaffected and removal updates cart correctly.
Use the clear cart button to remove all items.
Verify the cart is empty.

title: PDF generation and email sending with observations block
description: Verify that order PDF is generated with a green highlighted observations block with correct styles and can be downloaded and sent by email successfully.

steps.description: Add products with observations to the cart.
Generate a PDF order document from the cart.
Verify PDF contains all products and the observation block has green background, rounded corners, correct padding and spacing.
Download the PDF and verify it opens and matches UI.
Use the send order email feature with the generated PDF attached.
Verify email is successfully sent and the attachment is correct.

title: User authentication: login, registration, profile access
description: Verify that user login, user and company registration, and profile page work securely with server-side validation.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Attempt login with valid credentials.
Verify successful login and access to personalized features.
Logout and navigate to registration forms.
Attempt user registration with valid data.
Verify registration success and new user can login.
Attempt company registration with valid data.
Verify company is registered successfully.
Attempt login with invalid credentials.
Verify server-side validation rejects invalid data and shows correct error messages.
Access profile page after login.
Verify profile data is displayed and can be updated.

title: Internationalization: multi-language support and UI switching
description: Verify that UI text switches correctly between supported languages using JSON locale files and that language changes persist during navigation.

steps.description: Navigate to any page of the platform.
Switch language via the language selector UI.
Verify all visible text updates to the selected language.
Navigate between pages.
Verify selected language persists and UI remains translated.

title: Theme toggle: light and dark modes with visual effects
description: Verify that user can switch between light and dark themes and that visual effects such as neon, shimmer, and ripple adjust accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to any page.
Toggle theme between light and dark using theme switch UI.
Verify UI colors update for light and dark modes.
Verify neon glow, shimmer effects, and ripple buttons adapt their appearances to the active theme.

title: Comparison sidebar collapse button pulses neon green when collapsed
description: Verify that the comparison panel collapse button shows a neon green pulsing effect when collapsed and restores normal state when expanded.

steps.description: Add at least one product to the comparison panel.
Collapse the comparison sidebar using the collapse button.
Verify the collapse button pulses with neon green effect.
Expand the comparison sidebar.
Verify the collapse button pulsing effect disappears.

title: Modals close on ESC and have visible focus for accessibility
description: Verify that modals including cart and login close when pressing ESC key and that they show visible focus outlines for accessible keyboard navigation.

steps.description: Open the cart modal.
Verify the modal has visible focus outlines on interactive elements.
Press ESC key.
Verify the modal closes.
Open the login modal (if separate) or login page.
Verify visible focus outlines on form inputs.
Press ESC key.
Verify the login modal closes or focus returns appropriately.

title: Company search by CNPJ returns correct company data
description: Verify that searching for a company by valid CNPJ returns accurate company information and invalid CNPJ input handles errors gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to the company search interface.
Input a valid CNPJ number.
Verify that the correct company information is returned and displayed.
Input an invalid or malformed CNPJ.
Verify that an appropriate error message is shown and no crash occurs.

title: Performance and responsiveness on various devices and screen sizes
description: Verify the application loads quickly and UI elements adapt properly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices maintaining usability and accessibility.

steps.description: Open the application on a desktop browser.
Verify page loads within acceptable time thresholds and UI components render correctly.
Resize browser or use device emulation to simulate tablet viewport.
Verify UI adjusts properly with no layout breakage.
Simulate mobile viewport or test on real mobile device.
Verify that navigation, product grids, comparison panel, and modals work with adaptation for smaller screen sizes.
